overview: Rick Neely has extensive financial and operations management experience in the semiconductor and software markets. He has successfully worked with Fortune 500, small cap and start-up companies to manage periods of rapid growth and development around the world. Rick’s international experience includes finance, treasury, IT and logistics services in Asia and Europe. Before joining the Livescribe team, he served as senior vice president and CFO of Monolithic Power Systems, a global manufacturer of high performance analog semiconductors. Prior to his tenure at Monolithic Power Systems, Rick was the chief financial officer of NuCore Technology. Rick holds an MBA from the University of Chicago and an undergraduate degree in Economics from Whitman College.
